channel.title: Zip on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log
channel.description: Recent content in Zip on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log

item.title: #TIL : Zip compressing list of files
item.description: Zip compressing list of files To specify a list of compressed files when using zip cli tool, you could use -@ [file_list] flag. And file_list is a file contains list of compressed file (new line separated) Example $ zip changed.zip -@ changed_files.txt Or use stdin pipe $ find . -mmin -60 -print | zip changed_1_hour_ago -@ This will zip all changed files 1 hour ago
